page.title: 14MORNING OF A ROYAL VISIT
page.content: The town was covered in flags and ribbon,I thought Atherstone was going to burst it was so packed with people! In the morning there was a lot of exitement and work, the cameras came from the Central T.V and started filming the main masque characters.The cleaners were putting the final touches to the hall.We put our costumes on at a quarter to eleven with thoughts rushing through my mind ,such as "Would they be late?"I felt really nervous before we went in, but as I skipped around hitting villeins with my pigs bladder,I felt better.At the end of the ballad we all stood inn our pattern and Prince and Princess of Wales came to speak to us.It seemed strange being in the same room as the Royal Couple.Princess Di asked me about the bladder ,screwed up her face and said"Ugh!" SARAH EVERETT AGED 12.
